trends: There has been one other sighting in Sawyer
There were no other sightings in Sawyer on or around October 26th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsFour lights pulsating. Two quite close to each other. Two others spread spread apart in an irregular spacing.There were about fifteen cars parked watching with people out of thier cars watching.The lights appeared to be moving away slowly with no noise ,heading south away from us.It was absolutly quiet outside and no airplane noise.It was cloudy so they had to be below the clouds , with no stars to be seen.They gradually faded away .
